sentence: Steam room sauna hold tub medium tub and cold tub

At Excellence PM we escape the noise by booking a rooftop terrace room with our own pool and preferentially a spa view room so we do not have to hear the pounding dance music and pool games of the main Excellence pool
A 2 person jacuzi tub with a window view and stand up dual shower
Bathroom shower has 6 shower heads
Have had better rooms before and we loved the swim out room to the lazy river at excellence but the other things made up for that
I did ask upon arrival if they could upgrade us to a higher floor room with an ocean view explaining we were celebrating an anniversary
The first day we avoided it by going to lunch as soon as we checked in then someone called our room as soon as we walked in
So unles you want to spend a lot more for a governors suite I would highly recommend the Jr Suite especially ocean front
Make sure you have your butler set you up with the bubble bath at night
couples message and surf and turf dinner overlooking the beach during sunset in their covered cabana
The beach in this area is the widest on this section of the hotel strip and has a breathtaking view of all the beautiful blue shades of the Caribbean water
The rooms are VERY relaxing with one of the best beds I ’ve ever slept in
Every single thing from the guest rooms with our own butler to the dining to the lovely pools and beach was geared towards pampering guests
I especially enjoyed the outdoor dining options at Terazo the food and views were great and they offer breakfast lunch and dinner
Beautiful property great rooms perfect service well maintained and staffed beach and real good food offerings at their top notch restaurants
5th Floor ocean view honeymoon suite was very nice
From the butler to the tour of the room the friendly staff

We had two amazing butlers on our floor Rene and Juan they also made our lives very easy making dinner reservations and anything thing we required in our room I only had to ask them once and it would appear I never had to ask again
You can tell the hotel has been recently renovated as the finish of the rooms and grounds is immaculate
The beach pools gym spa and rooms are very well maintained
